base_description: Rectangular teal box with yellow stripes.
part_description: The box has a main rectangular body, teal in color, with yellow diagonal stripes on two edges. A thin horizontal band encircles the middle of the box.
internal_interaction_description: The thin horizontal band likely serves as a closure or hinge, allowing the top part of the box to open or close. The stripes are purely decorative and do not interact with other parts.
external_interaction_description: The box can be held or opened by a person, possibly containing items inside. Its flat surfaces allow it to stand upright or lie flat on various surfaces.
